sections.title: Fire Safety
sections.text: Remain calm and evacuate. Use stairs, not lifts. Follow exit signs and assist others if safe.

sections.title: Personal Safety
sections.text: Stay alert; avoid isolated areas late at night. If you feel unsafe, call Campus Security immediately.

sections.title: Medical Emergencies
sections.text: For urgent help call 999 or Campus Security (082-260-607). Provide your location and stay on the line.

sections.title: Laboratory Safety
sections.text: Wear PPE and follow instructions. Report spills or incidents at once. Do not work alone.

sections.title: Weather & Environmental Hazards
sections.text: During severe weather, stay indoors and follow campus alerts. Avoid flooded areas.

sections.title: Information Counter
sections.text: ADM Building lobby, weekdays 8:30–17:00. Get directions, passes, and assistance.

sections.title: Student Support Centre
sections.text: Need help with housing or wellbeing? Call 082-260-610.

sections.title: Report Lost Items
sections.text: Visit Campus Security Office or call 082-260-607. Items are held up to 30 days.

sections.title: On-Campus Clinic
sections.text: Open Mon–Fri, 9:00–16:00. Next to the Student Centre.

sections.title: Campus Shuttle
sections.text: Free shuttle runs 8:00–18:00 between main buildings.

sections.title: Visitor Parking
sections.text: Parking near ADM Building; permits at the Information Counter.

sections.title: Security Escort (Night)
sections.text: Security escorts are available after dark between buildings.
